extension.description: Displaying Users from a selected CB List in a Module.

field.name: listid
field.label: SELECT the CB List to be presented in the module
field.query: SELECT listid, title FROM #__comprofiler_lists where published=1

field.name: orderby
field.label: Order by field
field.query: SELECT 0 AS sort, 'list_default' AS id, 'List default' AS title UNION SELECT 1 AS sort, name AS id, name AS title FROM #__comprofiler_fields WHERE published=1 ORDER BY sort,title ASC

field.name: text-above
field.label: Text to be included ABOVE the user list.

field.name: template
field.label: Template for displaying each user. Use [cb_fieldname] syntax to include fields.

field.name: rules
